main event: A 10-year-old boy reported seeing a shiny silvery object take off vertically from a wheat field in Hubbard, Oregon on May 15, 1964.
interesting points: The object was square-shaped with a silvery disc at the center and emitted beeping sounds like a diesel engine., Wheat was flattened in a circular area with three impressions on the edge., The boy witnessed the object rise slowly before accelerating and disappearing., The object was described as being about the size of a kitchen table and had a groove that looked like a door., The sheriff's deputy and Air Force officers later confirmed the strange ground markings left behind.
witness description: a 10-year-old boy and his mother who saw the flattened wheat
